reviewText: It was so much fun watching this video.  I had it converted to DVD as I no longer own a VHS player.  Watching this brought back memories of how the Red Wings won the cup for Vladimir Konstantinov.
Didn't know I could find DVD, so haven't opened. Sure its all good
Go Wings. I love these videos. My son watches this all the time. I never get tired of remembering why I love the Red Wings so much.

This is an excellent video about the Detroit Red Wings's 1997-1998 Stanley Cup season.  It is neither too short or too long, but the right length at 55 minutes.  This video is recommended for all hockey fans irregardless of whether or not they are Red Wings fans.
Heartily recommended.
